Producer: Will Ferrell, Adam McKay, Kristen Wiig, Annie Mumolo, Jessica Elbaum, Tom Rothman, Margot Hand
Production Co: Redrum, Gary Sanchez Productions, Lionsgate, Gloria Sanchez Productions
Rating: PG-13 (Some Strong Language|Drug Use|Crude Sexual Content)
Synopsis: Take a trip and break out of your shell with Barb and Star. From the gals who brought you Bridesmaids (co-stars and co-writers Kristen Wiig and Annie Mumolo) comes BARB & STAR GO TO VISTA DEL MAR. Lifelong friends Barb and Star embark on the adventure of a lifetime when they decide to leave their small Midwestern town for the first time... ever.
Title: Barb & Star Go to Vista Del Mar
